instructions.1: On a plate, place sliced sausage; set aside.
instructions.2: On a clean surface or serving tray, arrange crackers in two rows of twelve. Spread 1/2 to 1 teaspoon of mustard on half of the crackers; set aside.
instructions.3: On a medium-hot grill, place sausage slices, grill for 2 to 3 minutes or until slices begin to curl and edges begin to brown. Turn slices and center one piece of cheese onto each sausage slice. Cover. Grill an additional 1 to 2 minutes or until cheese begins to melt. Remove from grill and assemble s'mores. Serve immediately.

questions.question: Is mustard from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is serving tray live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we arrange (Step 2) and place (Step 3) at the same time?
